add_library(BoostHeaders INTERFACE)

set(BOOST_DIR "C:/bin/boost")
target_include_directories(BoostHeaders INTERFACE
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/accumulators/include"   
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/algorithm/include" 
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/align/include"
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/any/include"  
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/array/include"
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/asio/include" 
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/assert/include"

    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/atomic/include"    
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/beast/include"
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/bimap/include"
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/bind/include" 
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/callable_traits/include"
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/chrono/include"    
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/circular_buffer/include"
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/compatibility/include"  
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/compute/include"   
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/concept_check/include"  
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/config/include"    
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/container/include" 
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/container_hash/include" 
    "${BOOST_DIR}/libs/context/include"
